About Us
ABOUT US
Sommelier, Wellie, grew up in the hospitality industry with parents who owned restaurants since before she was born.  Serving others has been a part of her life literally from day one.
As her career progressed from serving in her parent’s restaurants to bartending, mixology, chef, sommelier, beverage director, general manager, director of operations, operating owner; she has worn all hats in the trade (including lots of dishwashing!) Finding her passion in gastronomy has lead her to Obscure Wine Company & Bliss Poignt Supper Club & Terroir Tours.
Wellie is a sommelier with credentials through the Court of Master Sommeliers America, Wine & Spirits Education Trust, 3iC Italian Wine Specialist, Certification in Winemaking & Viticulture from University of California, Davis.
With her knowledge, Wellie hopes to share her love of the beautiful wine regions & the hard working people that make the gorgeous wines we get to enjoy. Telling their personal stories of back-breaking work & devoted passion, one glass at a time.
Poetic Justice
“My goal as a sommelier is to bring poetic justice to the quality wines/winemakers that are often overlooked for the bulk juice that floods our grocery stores & restaurants. Most big brands throw around marketing money bribing big chains & spend more effort on creating hype, than focusing on what’s in the bottle, which is ultimately what really matters, right? They treat wine as if they’re making Coca-Cola for consumers that “talk dry but drink sweet”. Now is the time for a change in the wine industry. Follow my journey as I bring virtuous winemakers to light.” -Wellie
Meet The Team
Stephen Vallette
Owner & Operator
Wellie Liao
Founder & Sommelier
Bree Serpenti
Sommelier
Our Distributors

NEWS
RESERVATIONS
Downtown Winter Haven's Premier Wine Shoppe & Bar
X
Founder & Sommelier, Wellie Liao, brings her knowledge to Winter Haven with quality wines from around the world. To her, wines should have a soul of a place or a people so she focuses on producers & farmers who practice biodynamic, sustainable, organic, or la lutte raisonée, along with ethical business operations. Also, we support groups that have been traditionally marginalized by purchasing wine made by women & BIPOC. Telling their personal stories one glass (or bottle!) at a time. Whatever your budget, we are here to guide you to your new favorite wine to enjoy in house or at home.
​
“What does wine mean to you? For me, this living, breathing substance is a leap into another world. Whether this ever-changing juice takes me to the vineyard in which it was grown, to the cellar where it’s held & shared by the winemaker, or to the last time & place you enjoyed it. Wherever it transports you, it livens your soul & has you craving more. That’s why it is so important to me to carry wines that are hyper-focused on a sense of place. In my opinion the most natural wine in the world is not wine with no human intervention, but wine that is produced from grapes grown exactly where they are indigenous to. Let me take you on a journey deep into the obscure wine regions & varietals that you would normally shy away from because of their intimidating names & confusing wine labels. Ethically produced by real people, created to awaken your inner wanderlust.” -Wellie
Lite Fare
X

ABOUT
Sip & Shop
SHOPPING FOR A CAUSE
Enjoy our quaint retail section, filled with the cutest wine brands! We carry items sourced from other women owned businesses & items made by survivors of human trafficking. A portion of each retail sale benefits a non-profit organization fighting human trafficking.
